mapper.select: select b.botno, date_format(b.bot_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as bot_date, b.title, b.cont, b.view_cnt, b.hodu_cnt, b.cmt_cnt, b.shr_cnt, b.bot_cnt, ifnull(b.pt_path, "default") as pt_path, b.cpno, bn.newsno, bn.headline, bn.path from bot b left outer join bot_news bn on b.botno=bn.botno

select b.botno, b.bot_date, b.title, b.cont, b.view_cnt, b.hodu_cnt, b.cmt_cnt, b.shr_cnt, b.bot_cnt, ifnull(b.pt_path, "default") as pt_path, b.cpno, bn.newsno, bn.headline, bn.path from bot b left outer join bot_news bn on b.botno=bn.botno where year(b.bot_date) = #{value};
select c.cpno, c.cp_name from comp c inner join (select distinct c2.parno from comp c2 inner join bot b on b.cpno=c2.cpno) p on p.parno=c.parno
select br.mno, br.cpno, c.cp_name, br.reg_date from bot_rls br left join comp c on c.cpno = br.cpno where mno=#{value}

select b.botno, b.bot_date, b.title, b.cont, b.view_cnt, b.hodu_cnt, b.cmt_cnt, b.shr_cnt, b.bot_cnt, b.pt_path, b.cpno, b.keyword, bn.newsno, bn.headline, bn.path, cp.cp_name from bot b left outer join bot_news bn on b.botno=bn.botno left outer join comp cp on b.cpno=cp.cpno where b.botno=#{value}

select b.botno, b.bot_date, b.title, b.cont, b.view_cnt, b.hodu_cnt, b.cmt_cnt, b.shr_cnt, bn.newsno, bn.headline, bn.path from bot b left outer join bot_news bn on b.botno=bn.botno where b.botno=#{value}
mapper.insert: insert into bot_rls(mno, cpno, reg_date) values(#{memberNo},#{companyNo},now())
mapper.delete: delete from bot_rls where mno=#{memberNo} and cpno=#{companyNo}
mapper.select: select botno, title, date_format(bot_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as bot_date from bot where title like concat('%',#{value},'%') or cont like concat('%',#{value},'%')
